sig_info: Whenever a Nullify, Stagger, or Fateseal is prevented by Mister Negative’s immunity, deal a burst of 8.7 to 34.8 Physical Damage.
While suffering from Degeneration, Regenerate +10.45 to 20.77 Health per second.
Each Light Energy grants +16.16 to 102.04 Energy Resistance.
Each Dark Energy deals 0.87 to 1.73 Physical Damage every second while the Opponent is suffering from a non-damaging Debuff. This scales with Base Attack only.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Mister Negative is immune to all Nullify, Stagger and Fateseal effects.
The potency of the Opponent's Degeneration effects are reduced by 40% for each unique Debuff they suffer.
When Evading, Mister Negative counter-attacks with a hit dealing a burst of 73.95 Physical Damage and granting the Opponent Power equal to a Medium Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit grants a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by +13.05 for 10 seconds.
While Charging a Heavy Attack, if 1 or more Light Energy are active, gain 100% Evade chance against Basic Attacks.
LIGHT ENERGY PASSIVE - MAX STACKS 20: Whenever either champion performs a Well-Timed Block, gain +2 Light Energy.
Dashing back removes all Buffs on Mister Negative, granting +1 Light Energy per Buff removed.
Light Energy lasts indefinitely until reaching 10 stacks after which all stacks will expire over 6 seconds.
DARK ENERGY PASSIVE - MAX STACKS 20: If Mister Negative performs an Evade or is Knocked down, all Light Energy is converted into Dark Energy.
Dark Energy lasts indefinitely until reaching 10 stacks after which all stacks will expire over 16 seconds.
While suffering from Disorient, all Dark Energy is removed and additional Dark Energy cannot be gained.
Each time Dark Energy is gained, inflict a Delirium Debuff lasting a flat 0.8 second(s) per Light Energy converted.
A Delirious Opponent suffers -60% Defensive Combat Power Rate and has their Dash and Dodge controls reversed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation gain a Bulwark Passive for 30 seconds, increasing Block Proficiency by +533.33 for each Light Energy, then convert all Light Energy into Dark Energy.
The final hit inflicts an Exhaustion Debuff, lowering the Opponent’s Critical Damage Rating by 171.43 for 20 seconds.
PASSIVE: Inflict a Delirium Debuff for 0 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The 1st hit inflicts a Petrify Debuff of 80% Potency for 20 seconds.
The 2nd hit inflicts another Petrify if 10 or more Dark Energy are active.
The 3rd hit inflicts a Degeneration Debuff, dealing up to 117.45 Direct Damage over 10 seconds.
The final hit consumes all remaining Dark Energy, inflicting 1 additional Degeneration for each Dark Energy consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Delirium Debuff for 20 seconds.
All Light Energy is consumed, each Regenerating 13.59 Health.
All Dark Energy is consumed, each dealing a burst of 73.95 Direct Damage to the Opponent.

sig_info: Whenever a Nullify, Stagger, or Fateseal is prevented by Mister Negative’s immunity, deal a burst of 11.5 to 46 Physical Damage.
While suffering from Degeneration, Regenerate +13.8 to 27.43 Health per second.
Each Light Energy grants +16.67 to 105.22 Energy Resistance.
Each Dark Energy deals 1.15 to 2.29 Physical Damage every second while the Opponent is suffering from a non-damaging Debuff. This scales with Base Attack only.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Mister Negative is immune to all Nullify, Stagger and Fateseal effects.
The potency of the Opponent's Degeneration effects are reduced by 40% for each unique Debuff they suffer.
When Evading, Mister Negative counter-attacks with a hit dealing a burst of 97.75 Physical Damage and granting the Opponent Power equal to a Medium Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit grants a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by +17.25 for 10 seconds.
While Charging a Heavy Attack, if 1 or more Light Energy are active, gain 100% Evade chance against Basic Attacks.
LIGHT ENERGY PASSIVE - MAX STACKS 20: Whenever either champion performs a Well-Timed Block, gain +2 Light Energy.
Dashing back removes all Buffs on Mister Negative, granting +1 Light Energy per Buff removed.
Light Energy lasts indefinitely until reaching 10 stacks after which all stacks will expire over 6 seconds.
DARK ENERGY PASSIVE - MAX STACKS 20: If Mister Negative performs an Evade or is Knocked down, all Light Energy is converted into Dark Energy.
Dark Energy lasts indefinitely until reaching 10 stacks after which all stacks will expire over 16 seconds.
While suffering from Disorient, all Dark Energy is removed and additional Dark Energy cannot be gained.
Each time Dark Energy is gained, inflict a Delirium Debuff lasting a flat 0.8 second(s) per Light Energy converted.
A Delirious Opponent suffers -60% Defensive Combat Power Rate and has their Dash and Dodge controls reversed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation gain a Bulwark Passive for 30 seconds, increasing Block Proficiency by +550 for each Light Energy, then convert all Light Energy into Dark Energy.
The final hit inflicts an Exhaustion Debuff, lowering the Opponent’s Critical Damage Rating by 176.79 for 20 seconds.
PASSIVE: Inflict a Delirium Debuff for 0 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The 1st hit inflicts a Petrify Debuff of 80% Potency for 20 seconds.
The 2nd hit inflicts another Petrify if 10 or more Dark Energy are active.
The 3rd hit inflicts a Degeneration Debuff, dealing up to 155.25 Direct Damage over 10 seconds.
The final hit consumes all remaining Dark Energy, inflicting 1 additional Degeneration for each Dark Energy consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Delirium Debuff for 20 seconds.
All Light Energy is consumed, each Regenerating 17.94 Health.
All Dark Energy is consumed, each dealing a burst of 97.75 Direct Damage to the Opponent.

Each Dark Energy deals 12.16 to 24.17 Physical Damage every second while the Opponent is suffering from a non-damaging Debuff. This scales with Base Attack only.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Mister Negative is immune to all Nullify, Stagger and Fateseal effects.
The potency of the Opponent's Degeneration effects are reduced by 40% for each unique Debuff they suffer.
When Evading, Mister Negative counter-attacks with a hit dealing a burst of 1033.6 Physical Damage and granting the Opponent Power equal to a Medium Attack.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit grants a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by +182.4 for 10 seconds.
While Charging a Heavy Attack, if 1 or more Light Energy are active, gain 100% Evade chance against Basic Attacks.
LIGHT ENERGY PASSIVE - MAX STACKS 20: Whenever either champion performs a Well-Timed Block, gain +2 Light Energy.
Dashing back removes all Buffs on Mister Negative, granting +1 Light Energy per Buff removed.
Light Energy lasts indefinitely until reaching 10 stacks after which all stacks will expire over 6 seconds.
DARK ENERGY PASSIVE - MAX STACKS 20: If Mister Negative performs an Evade or is Knocked down, all Light Energy is converted into Dark Energy.
Dark Energy lasts indefinitely until reaching 10 stacks after which all stacks will expire over 16 seconds.
While suffering from Disorient, all Dark Energy is removed and additional Dark Energy cannot be gained.
Each time Dark Energy is gained, inflict a Delirium Debuff lasting a flat 0.8 second(s) per Light Energy converted.
A Delirious Opponent suffers -60% Defensive Combat Power Rate and has their Dash and Dodge controls reversed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On activation gain a Bulwark Passive for 30 seconds, increasing Block Proficiency by +666.67 for each Light Energy, then convert all Light Energy into Dark Energy.
The final hit inflicts an Exhaustion Debuff, lowering the Opponent’s Critical Damage Rating by 214.29 for 20 seconds.
PASSIVE: Inflict a Delirium Debuff for 0 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: The 1st hit inflicts a Petrify Debuff of 80% Potency for 20 seconds.
The 2nd hit inflicts another Petrify if 10 or more Dark Energy are active.
The 3rd hit inflicts a Degeneration Debuff, dealing up to 1641.6 Direct Damage over 10 seconds.
The final hit consumes all remaining Dark Energy, inflicting 1 additional Degeneration for each Dark Energy consumed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a Delirium Debuff for 20 seconds.
All Light Energy is consumed, each Regenerating 189.75 Health.
All Dark Energy is consumed, each dealing a burst of 1033.6 Direct Damage to the Opponent.
